MASTML Initializer¶

MASTML initializer classes:

ConfigFileParser: Class to read in contents of MASTML input files

ConfigFileConstructor: Constructor class to build input file template. Used for input file validation and data type casting.

ConfigFileValidator: Class to validate contents of user-specified MASTML input file and flag any errors

ModelTestConstructor: Class that takes parameters from configdict (configfile as dict) and performs calls to appropriate MASTML methods

Code¶

class MASTMLInitializer.ConfigFileParser(configfile)[source]¶

Class to read in contents of MASTML input files

Parameters:configfile (MASTML configfile object) – a MASTML input file, as a configfile object
get_config_dict()¶

returns dict representation of configfile

Parameters:path_to_file (str) – path indicating where config file is stored
Returns:configdict of parsed input file
Return type:dict
class MASTMLInitializer.ConfigFileConstructor(configfile)[source]¶

Constructor class to build input file template. Used for input file validation and data type casting.

Parameters:configfile (MASTML configfile object) – a MASTML input file, as a configfile object
get_config_template()¶

returns template of input file for validation

Returns:configdict of template input file
Return type:dict
class MASTMLInitializer.ConfigFileValidator(configfile)[source]¶

Class to validate contents of user-specified MASTML input file and flag any errors

Parameters:configfile (MASTML configfile object) – a MASTML input file, as a configfile object
run_config_validation()¶

checks configfile object for errors

Returns:configdict of parsed input file bool : whether any errors occurred parsing the input file
Return type:dict
class MASTMLInitializer.ModelTestConstructor(configdict)[source]¶

Class that takes parameters from configdict (configfile as dict) and performs calls to appropriate MASTML methods

Parameters:configfile (MASTML configfile object) – a MASTML input file, as a configfile object
get_machinelearning_model()¶

obtains machine learning model by calling sklearn

Parameters:
  • model_type (str) – keyword string indicating sklearn model name
  • y_feature (str) – name of target feature
Returns:

an sklearn model object for fitting to data
Return type:

sklearn model object
get_machinelearning_test()¶

obtains test name to conduct from configdict

Parameters:
  • test_type (str) – keyword string specifying type of MASTML test to perform
  • model (sklearn model object) – sklearn model object to use in test_type
  • save_path (str) – path of save directory to store test output
